posts.post_content:
Anyone on Net54 win the lot of 187 B&W Baltimore Orioles postcards in the Lelands auction last night or know who did?   I only needed 5 postcards from the group and willing to purchase any or all. 

The five I need are .....

1958-60  Milt Pappas (thin style)
1961  Marv Breeding
1962  Ron Hansen
1962  Wes Stock
1963  Luis Aparicio

Thanks
Alan Strout

Good luck Alan!  I hope the buyer comes through for you!

To the buyer, I am interested in the 1957-59 Team Issue PC of Brooks Robinson from that lot.

Thx,
Derek

[quote name="h2oya311" post=2045420]Good luck Alan!  I hope the buyer comes through for you!

To the buyer, I am interested in the 1957-59 Team Issue PC of Brooks Robinson from that lot.

Thx,

Thanks Derek,

I was hoping the buyer was you.  :D
